attributes.action: Have a Review on the Sorn System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Sorn system was introduced to catch criminals invading Road Tax. It has since turned into a revenue busting penalty system on honest individals that fail to remember when they submited the form. Backed by the absence of an appeal system, and the main phone number only set up to take money. - This will proberbly be regected like the 6 before. Because it is similar which it isn`t.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
